title: Meowkai
body:
WEOW

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/03/38-pbe-update.html#newskins

Also Aurelion Sol skin looks sick. Congrats Riot, here is another $30.

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-EGM3SJ04Kqk/Vt9Fr3okJnI/AAAAAAAAMBg/9Ob7GUWZTuE/s1600/maokai.jpg

replies.body: im just imagining the big headed draven surrounded by all the draven head minions...

When I read the title.
I actually just thought it was a giant lumpy cat, that threw balls of Yarn.

But this looks awesome too.

Shut up and take my money!.

I have been waiting for a good Maokai skin for awhile now. one of my commonly played champions I don't own a skin for. Pairs nicely with Poro rider Sejauni.
I'm loving the haunted moakai but yeah this skin looks sick can't wait to get it
